entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 10:04 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow before morning. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Windy. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
